import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import {Button, Card, Accordion} from "react-bootstrap"; import './VistaInfant.css'; import PopupAlert from "./PopupAlert"; export default function VistaInfant({profile}) { const handleClick = (item) => { }; return(

{profile.Nom} {profile.Congnom}

Edat: {profile.Edat} anys

Curs: {profile.IDCurs}

Observacions:

{profile.Observacions}

Persona de Contacte

{profile.Tutor}

Telefon: {profile.telefon}
) }
